heading: Wednesday Night
text: Cloudy. A mix of mainly valley rain and mountain snow, becoming all snow in the St. Lawrence Valley, with 2 to 4 inches there and in the northern mountains; mainly rain in the valleys from the Hudson and Champlain valleys eastward. Lows in the low to mid 30s, except in the 20s in far northern New York. South winds around 10 mph, becoming west in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers west of the Greens, and over high terrain in the east, with 1 to 4 inches, highest in the St. Lawrence Valley; a mix of rain and snow showers in eastern valleys, with a trace to an inch. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40 east of the Greens; morning highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s west, except mid to upper 20s in far northern New York. Winds from the west 5 to 15 mph in New York, elsewhere from the south 5 to 10 mph, and becoming west to northwest in the afternoon.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers, mainly in the northern mountains and southern Greens, with another trace to 2 inches. Lows from zero to 10 above in the north, low to mid teens in the south. West winds 5 to 15 mph.
